name: Slow Cooker Shredded Beef Sandwiches
author: LEAHB21
summary: I like to serve these mouth-watering sandwiches with a side of coleslaw. The homemade barbecue sauce is exceptional and is wonderful for dipping.
ingredients: 1 (3.5 pound) beef eye of round roast, cut in half
directions: Whisk beef broth, ketchup, brown sugar, lemon juice, steak sauce, garlic, pepper, and Worcestershire sauce together in a small bowl
Pour 1/2 of the mixture into a 5-quart slow cooker
Add beef to the slow cooker and cover with the remaining broth mixture
Cook on Low until tender, 10 to 12 hours
Shred beef on a cutting board using 2 forks; return to the slow cooker
Use a slotted spoon to place about 1/2 cup of the beef mixture on each sandwich bun
